00032 /* Calculates the Clebsch-Gordan coefficients by Racha's closed
00033  * expression.
00034  */

00251 
00252 static double f1c(int n) {
00253     double x;
00254     if(n < MAX_FACTAB) return tab_fac[n];
00255     else {
00256         x = (double)n;
00257         while(--n >= MAX_FACTAB) x *= (double)n;
00258         return x*tab_fac[n];
00259     }
00260 }
00261 
00262 
00263 static double f2c(int n) {
00264     double x;
00265     int m;
00266     m = n/2;
00267     if(n < MAX_FACTAB) {
00268         if(n%2 == 0)
00269             return ldexp(f1c(m), m);
00270         else
00271             return tab_oddfac[m];
00272     } else {
00273         x = (double)n;
00274         n -= 2;
00275         while(n >= MAX_FACTAB) {
00276             x *= (double)n;
00277             n -= 2;
00278         }
00279         return x*f2c(n);
00280     }
00281 }
00282 
00283 
00284 static double f1h(int n) {
00285     double x;
00286     if(n%2==1) {
00287         n /= 2;
00288         if(n < MAX_FACTAB)
00289             return ldexp(tab_oddfac[n], -n-1)*c_pi_sqrt;
00290         else
00291             return ldexp(f2c(2*n+1), -n-1)*c_pi_sqrt;
00292     } else {
00293         n /= 2;
00294         if(n < MAX_FACTAB) return tab_fac[n];
00295         else {
00296             x = (double)n;
00297             while(--n >= MAX_FACTAB) x *= (double)n;
00298             return x*tab_fac[n];
00299         }
00300     }
00301 }
00302 
00303 
00304 double clebsch(int jj1, int jj2, int jj3, int mm1, int mm2, int mm3) {
00305     int nnu, lower, upper;
00306     double x, sign;
00307 
00308     if(mm3 != mm1 + mm2) return 0.;
00309 
00310     x = 0.0;
00311     lower = jj2-jj3-mm1;
00312     lower = (jj1-jj3+mm2 > lower? jj1-jj3+mm2 : lower);
00313     if(lower < 0) lower = 0;
00314     sign = lower%4? -1. : 1.;
00315     upper = jj1+jj2-jj3;
00316     upper = (jj1-mm1 < upper? jj1-mm1 : upper);
00317     upper = (jj2+mm2 < upper? jj2+mm2 : upper);
00318     assert(!(lower%2));
00319     assert(!(upper%2));
00320     for(nnu = lower; nnu <= upper; nnu += 2) {
00321         x += sign/(f1h(nnu)*f1h(jj1+jj2-jj3-nnu)*f1h(jj1-mm1-nnu)
00322                    *f1h(jj2+mm2-nnu)*f1h(jj3-jj2+mm1+nnu)
00323                    *f1h(jj3-jj1-mm2+nnu));
00324 
00325         sign = -sign;
00326     }
00327 
00328     x *= sqrt((double)(jj3+1)*f1h(jj1+jj2-jj3)*f1h(jj3+jj1-jj2)
00329               *f1h(jj3+jj2-jj1)/f1h(jj1+jj2+jj3+2)
00330               *f1h(jj1+mm1)*f1h(jj1-mm1)*f1h(jj2+mm2)*f1h(jj2-mm2)
00331               *f1h(jj3+mm3)*f1h(jj3-mm3));
00332     return x;
00333 }
